name: Meteor Shower
tooltip: Bombards area with frozen meteors, dealing <d ref="duckiesCloneCasterBlizzard_PeriodicDamageRadius.amount*duckiesCloneCaster_PeriodicPersistent.periodic.count*(duckiesCloneCasterBlizzard_InitialPersistent.periodic.count+1)" style="Red" precision="0"/> damage over <d ref="(duckiesCloneCasterBlizzard_InitialPersistent.periodic.count+1)*duckiesCloneCasterBlizzard_InitialPersistent.periodic.durations[0]"/> seconds.
